info.name: My Collection
info.description:
### Welcome to Postman! This is your first collection. 

Collections are your starting point for building and testing APIs. You can use this one to:

• Group related requests
• Test your API in real-world scenarios
• Document and share your requests

Update the name and overview whenever you’re ready to make it yours.

[Learn more about Postman Collections.](https://learning.postman.com/docs/collections/collections-overview/)

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/140.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl 'https://yard-backend-trpc-bmlvpxpwtq-ey.a.run.app/trpc/spaces.createSpace?batch=1' \
  -H 'accept: */*' \
  -H 'accept-language: ru,uk;q=0.9,ru-RU;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.7,en;q=0.6' \
  -H 'authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IkRlTkJ3MDBSN1JEZUhLZloiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ..6R_zWWy2LZAGzbGB5d5c1PB1Cnk_bpTCnqn0PoeJQiQ' \
  -H 'content-type: application/json' \
  -H 'origin: https://yard-noty.web.app' \
  -H 'priority: u=1, i' \
  -H 'referer: https://yard-noty.web.app/' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua: "Chromium";v="140", "Not=A?Brand";v="24", "Google Chrome";v="140"' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-platform: "Windows"' \
  -H 'sec-fetch-dest: empty' \
  -H 'sec-fetch-mode: cors' \
  -H 'sec-fetch-site: cross-site' \
  -H 'user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/140.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' \
  --data-raw '{"0":{"workspaceId":"89497bff-12e2-40cf-a93d-5d21efd9fbad","spaceData":{"name":"Progress Folder","color":"green","accessors":[]}}}'

exec: pm.test("Найденый в ответе ID совпадает с folder_id из окружения ", function () {
pm.expect(id, "ID совпадает с folder_id из окружения").to.eql(folderId);
